name: Duckality
description:
Go on an epic quest, traverse the divide between realms to rescue King K-Wack and return his crown! talk to the fully voice acted residents of Pondon, acquire items and complete puzzles to save the duck pond.

---WASD - Move---
---Mouse - Look---
---Left Mouse Button -  Quack (when Unlocked)---

Created by a team of 2 for the Global Game Jam 2022 using the prompt "Duality".

Kai Ismay - Voice "Acting", Programming & Level design     https://www.artstation.com/kabutokai 

Toby Monks - Voice "Acting",  Character & prop art      https://www.artstation.com/tobymonks
